attributes.additional_details: On 04th Oct 2013 was issued forged document by Lithuanian authorities to UK authorities which destroyed child's life. The minor child was given for abuse and torture, hiding criminal records of sexual rape and mental disease of his perpetrator. The ministry of interior of Lithuania provided forged document to UK authorities and requested under not existent Lithuanian law 14.5  restrictions to hide data about abuser father.
attributes.background: Child was given for abuse and torture due forged document of Lithuanian ministry of interior.   Please implement V law that each foreign document must be reviewed by UK Court. Please review all cases of Lithuanian Children which were dealt at UK courts, thoroughly reviewing each Lithuanian document

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you believe you have evidence of child abuse in the UK, you should report it to the police.
